comment_text: Why isn't this video get more views under nearly 10 million subscribers channel? Description said 'old video' posted 11 year ago so the occurrence was even older. Just to proof Destin got lots of character histories and his work and fans wasn't built overnight.

Big fan man. Had no idea the roots of the channel were so humbled and beautiful. Fayetteville neighbor here my man. Much love. Just across the line to north if you ever need help with anything. I'll do what I can. Much love.
Wow, being one of the only people to watch this...
Keep spreading the word of God Destin! May God's peace be with you always!
Destin. You are a great man. Thank you for chasing after God's heart, whether it is in Peru, Ghana, or in the great state of Alabama.
I also went on a mission trip to Peru... Dec 2010.  Amazing!  Thanks for sharing your experience.  To God be the glory!  :)
Dustin, no audio! could you fix that please?
Awesome vid. I went on a missions trip to Mexico and this brings back some good memories :)
Oh my gosh. I haven't hear this song in like 8 years.

"When we get over ourselves and live for others, only then will we truly live."
I love everything you stand for, Destin.  From a Catholic to a fellow Christian, and from one scientist to another, keep living the Gospel in hope and finding beauty in God's creation. God bless you, brother.
This may be the video you've posted with the lowest views, but I'm happy to have seen it. I've always wanted to go on a mission like this. Thank you for posting this destinws2.

This is very refreshing. Thanks a lot!!! It is so true, and infinitely more so to those of us who know Jesus' love for ourselves, so we have all the more reason to pass it on. Way to be an encouragement, to me and others I'm sure. God Bless!
